com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions

Interface CoordinatorException

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlreadyExistsException, AuthenticationException, BootstrappingException, BusyConnectionException, BusyPoolException, ConnectionException, FunctionExecutionException, InvalidConfigurationInQueryException, InvalidQueryException, OperationTimedOutException, OverloadedException, ProtocolError, QueryConsistencyException, ReadFailureException, ReadTimeoutException, ServerError, SyntaxError, TransportException, TruncateException, UnauthorizedException, UnavailableException, UnpreparedException, UnsupportedProtocolVersionException, WriteFailureException, WriteTimeoutException

    public interface CoordinatorException
    An interface for exceptions that are able to report the address of the coordinator host that was contacted.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InetSocketAddress getAddress()
      The full address of the coordinator host that was contacted.
      InetAddress getHost()
      The coordinator host that was contacted.

    • Method Detail

      • getHost

        InetAddress getHost()
        The coordinator host that was contacted.

        This is a shortcut for getAddress().getAddress().

        Returns:
        The coordinator host that was contacted; may be null if the coordinator is not known.

      • getAddress

        InetSocketAddress getAddress()
        The full address of the coordinator host that was contacted.
        Returns:
        the full address of the coordinator host that was contacted; may be null if the coordinator is not known.
